languages.text: {n}Символ на перстне бел, как волосы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестер Сороритас{/g}.{/n} "Цвет определяет степень близости подателя перстня к Лорд-инквизитору. Белый — красивый, но уязвимый цвет. Его легко запятнать, и так же легко утратить оказанное нами доверие. Дорожите им".

traits.locale_text: {n}Символ на перстне бел, как волосы Сестер Сороритас.{/n} "Цвет определяет степень близости подателя перстня к Лорду-инквизитору. Белый означает, что вы признаны достойн{mf|ым|ой} и чист{mf|ым|ой}. А Инквизиция щедро награждает чистые души".

languages.text: {n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White is beautiful yet vulnerable. It stains as easily as one can lose the Inquisition's trust. Do all you can to preserve it."
languages.original_text: {n}Символ на перстне бел, как волосы {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестер Сороритас{/g}.{/n} "Цвет определяет степень близости подателя перстня к Лорд-инквизитору. Белый — красивый, но уязвимый цвет. Его легко запятнать, и так же легко утратить оказанное нами доверие. Дорожите им".

traits.locale_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the Adepta Sororitas.{/n} "The color indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White means that you have been deemed worthy and pure. And the Inquisition generously rewards pure souls."

{n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the Adepta Sororitas.{/n} "The color indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White means that you have been deemed worthy and pure. And the Inquisition generously rewards pure souls."

{n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White is beautiful yet vulnerable. It stains as easily as one can lose the Inquisition's trust. Do all you can to preserve it."

{n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White is beautiful yet vulnerable. It stains as easily as one can lose the Inquisition's trust. Do all you can to preserve it."

{n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White is beautiful yet vulnerable. It stains as easily as one can lose the Inquisition's trust. Do all you can to preserve it."

languages.text: {n}印章指輪の紋章は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}の髪を表す白だ。{/n}「色は指輪の持ち主とロード・インクィジターとの関係を表す。白は美しいが染まりやすい。白が簡単に汚れるように、異端審問庁の信用も簡単に失われるだろう。力を尽くして美しさを保つのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White is beautiful yet vulnerable. It stains as easily as one can lose the Inquisition's trust. Do all you can to preserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章指輪の紋章は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}の髪を表す白だ。{/n}「色は指輪の持ち主とロード・インクィジターとの関係を表す。白は美しいが染まりやすい。白が簡単に汚れるように、異端審問庁の信用も簡単に失われるだろう。力を尽くして美しさを保つのだ」

languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the Adepta Sororitas.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White means that you have been deemed worthy and pure. And the Inquisition generously rewards pure souls."

languages.text: {n}戒指上的图章与{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}战斗修女{/g}的头发一样洁白。{/n}“图章的颜色代表持有者与大审判官的关系。白色美丽而脆弱，也很容易被其他杂色玷染，正如审判庭的信任很容易破裂一样。尽你所能维持这样的信任关系吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White is beautiful yet vulnerable. It stains as easily as one can lose the Inquisition's trust. Do all you can to preserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}戒指上的图章与{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}战斗修女{/g}的头发一样洁白。{/n}“图章的颜色代表持有者与审判长的关系。白色代表你的价值与纯洁得到了认可，审判庭将慷慨地奖赏纯洁的灵魂。”

languages.text: {n}El símbolo del anillo es blanco como el pelo de una miembro del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} «El color indica el nivel de proximidad de su portador al Lord Inquisidor. El blanco es bello, pero vulnerable. Se ensucia con la misma facilidad con la que se pierde la confianza de la Inquisición. Haga todo lo que pueda para conservarlo».
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White is beautiful yet vulnerable. It stains as easily as one can lose the Inquisition's trust. Do all you can to preserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}El símbolo del anillo es blanco como el pelo de una miembro del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} «El color indica el nivel de proximidad de su portador al Lord Inquisidor. El blanco indica que se le considera dign{mf|o|a} y pur{mf|o|a}. La Inquisición recompensa generosamente a las almas puras».

languages.text: {n}Le symbole qui orne la chevalière est aussi blanc que les cheveux des sœurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} « La couleur indique à quel point vous êtes proche du seigneur inquisiteur. Le blanc est admirable, mais précaire. Il se tache aussi facilement que l'on peut perdre la confiance de l'Inquisition. Faites tout ce qui est en votre pouvoir pour préserver sa pureté. »
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White is beautiful yet vulnerable. It stains as easily as one can lose the Inquisition's trust. Do all you can to preserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le symbole qui orne la chevalière est aussi blanc que les cheveux des sœurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} « La couleur indique à quel point vous êtes proche du seigneur inquisiteur. Le blanc signifie que vous avez été {mf|jugé|jugée} digne et {mf|pur|pure}, et l'Inquisition récompense généreusement les âmes pures. »

languages.text: {n}Das Symbol auf dem Siegel ist weiß wie das Haar der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "Die Farbe zeigt an, wie nah der Träger dem Großinquisitor steht. Weiß ist wunderschön, aber verletzlich. Es wird ebenso leicht schmutzig, wie man das Vertrauen der Inquisition verlieren kann. Tut alles, um seine Reinheit zu erhalten."
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White is beautiful yet vulnerable. It stains as easily as one can lose the Inquisition's trust. Do all you can to preserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Symbol auf dem Siegel ist weiß wie das Haar der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "Die Farbe zeigt an, wie nah der Träger dem Großinquisitor steht. Weiß bedeutet, dass Ihr als würdig und rein geltet. Und die Inquisition belohnt reine Seelen großzügig."

languages.text: {n}Mührün üzerindeki sembol, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} saçları kadar beyaz.{/n} "Renk, yüzüğün taşıyıcısının Lord Engizisyoncu'ya yakınlık derecesini ifade eder. Beyaz, güzel olduğu kadar kırılgandır da. Engizisyon'un güvenini kaybettiğinde kolaylıkla lekelenebilir. Beyazlığını korumak için elinden geleni yap."
languages.original_text: {n}The symbol on the signet is white as the hair of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}.{/n} "The colour indicates how close the bearer is to the Lord Inquisitor. White is beautiful yet vulnerable. It stains as easily as one can lose the Inquisition's trust. Do all you can to preserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mührün üzerindeki sembol {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}'ın saçı kadar beyaz.{/n} "Renk, yüzüğün taşıyıcısının Lord Engizisyoncu'ya yakınlık derecesini ifade eder. Beyaz, güzel olduğu kadar kırılgandır da. Engizisyon'un güvenini kaybettiğinde kolaylıkla lekelenebilir. Beyazlığını korumak için elinden geleni yap."
